General.Name: Goosehead Insurance Inc
General.Description: Goosehead Insurance, Inc. operates as a holding company for Goosehead Financial, LLC that provides personal lines insurance agency services in the United States. It offers homeowner's, automotive, dwelling property, flood, wind, earthquake, excess liability or umbrella, motorcycle, recreational vehicle, general liability, property, and life insurance products and services. The company has 2,125 franchise locations. Goosehead Insurance, Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Westlake, Texas.

3.Name: Mr. Patrick Ryan Langston
3.Title: Chief Legal Officer, VP, Gen. Counsel & Corp. Sec.
